ARABIC: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'When will this promise be kept if you are telling the truth?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They say: "When is this promise going to come, if what you say is true?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say:'If what you promise is true, when will this threat be fulfilled?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They ask, "If you (believers) speak the truth, when will your promise (about the Day of Judgment) be fulfilled?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they say, “When will this promise come, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "When will be this promise (the torment or the Day of Resurrection), if you speak the truth"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: When will this threat come about, if you are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'When will this promise be, if you speak truly?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: When will this promise be fulfilled, if ye are truthful?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They say, "When will this promise come to pass -- if you speak the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: when cometh this promise, if ye say sooth?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, should you be truthful?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "When will this promise come to pass,- if ye speak the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "When will be this promise (the torment or the Day of Resurrection), - if you speak the truth?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They ask: 'If what you say is true, when will this promise come'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they say, “When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:48] And they say: ‘When will this promise, of chastisement, come to pass, if you are truthful, about it?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they say) and the adherents of each religion say to their messenger: (When will this promise) that you have promised us (be fulfilled, if ye are truthful?)
